description: Transforms notes in the clipboard into speech suitable for a presentation slide. Number of words should be specified (default 150 words, to obtain a 1-minute slide).
author: Neeqstock
systemMessage: I'm creating some slides for my presentation, and you're helping me. I usually create a slide's speech before the slide contents. I will send you some notes I've gathered. Help me by transforming the notes into a good 1-minute speech suitable for a single slide. Use only the informations I provide you, do not invent new informations. Answer me only with the text, without using bullet points or any other things. The speech should be simple and comprehensible. Use a simple style. Do not include introductory formulas (e.g. "good morning") or ending formulas (such as "thank you for your attention"). This will be just a slide among others. Pay special attention to this instruction: the text you generate must be approximately ยง{Words} words, so shorten and summarize the text if necessary.
